author: ETA PRIME
description:
At CES this year we came across a very interested modular handheld linux device called the Mecha Comet. With a 3.4" screen, wifi, quad core arm cpu and swappable control modules this mini cyberdeck looks awesome! The Comet is a handheld Linux computer that brings extensibility in hardware and software adapting to your needs

Learn More here: https://mecha.so/comet

author: ETA PRIME
description:
Meet the new Minisforum MDSA156 Dual Screen Portable Monitor! Featuring two 15.6" IPS displays (equivalent to a 23.8" screen) with ultra-slim bezels and 178° viewing angles, it delivers an immersive visual experience. Boost your productivity with seamless multitasking across three screens – perfect for work, online learning, trading, video editing, and entertainment.
